title: idu eNu nODe
sahitya:
idu Enu nODe idu rangana mukha candadi bADe sakhi


caraNam 1    nIroLADidane bennasi doDDa bhAra pottane kOredADayinda 
sILi kashipina karuLa mAleya dharisida narasimha rUpane
    caraNam 2    dhareyanaLeda pAdadalondu paraccheya tarida nAra vastravanu 
uTTu nanda gOkuladalli mandharagiri etti tanda beLadanamma
    caraNam 3    battale iruva uttama tEji hatti tAne mereva bhaktavatsala namma 
purandara viTTalanna cittakke meredante attAta biDanamma
